trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGZD007_05096_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> The unnerved hunter appears too frightened to move.
TEXT_KINGZD007_05096_TODO_00<tab>Keep lookout at the designated locations and slay any beasts that appear.
TEXT_KINGZD007_05096_TIMID05096_000_001<tab>Y-You travel with Wuk Lamat, don't you? That means you must be strong, and strong's what I need right about now!
TEXT_KINGZD007_05096_TIMID05096_000_002<tab>These ruins tend to attract wild beasts, so we send out regular patrols to check them from time to time. But as soon as I got here, I was overwhelmed!

TEXT_KINGZD007_05096_TIMID05096_000_003<tab>I managed to fight them off and escape, but my weapons broke in the struggle. I can't hope to finish my patrol now, unless I want to end up as some fiend's lunch...

TEXT_KINGZD007_05096_TIMID05096_000_006<tab>I hate to shirk my duty like this, but I have no choice but to ask you to patrol the area in my stead. Those things might still be lurking about─if you find them, I reckon you know what to do.
TEXT_KINGZD007_05096_TIMID05096_000_007<tab>I'm helpless without my weapons. Please, patrol the area in my stead─and be vigilant for any remaining fiends.
TEXT_KINGZD007_05096_TIMID05096_000_020<tab>You're back. I heard the sounds of battle, but all seems quiet now... Thank you.

TEXT_KINGZD007_05096_TIMID05096_000_021<tab>You wouldn't think it to see the ruins now, but this place used to be a vibrant village of gatherers. They took their bounty from the verdant nature around them.

TEXT_KINGZD007_05096_TIMID05096_000_022<tab>But they weren't a fighting people, and as our conflict with the Mamool Ja escalated, one by one they chose to find safety elsewhere...until their home was abandoned completely.

TEXT_KINGZD007_05096_TIMID05096_000_023<tab>Ilyon Asoh means “scars that remain.” And this place is a scar we all bear. We keep the old buildings here as a reminder of the toll war exacts on us all, so that we don't repeat the mistakes of the past.
TEXT_KINGZD007_05096_TIMID05096_000_024<tab>Well, I'd better report to the hunters that all is well. Here, please accept this token of my gratitude!
